title: Alex Gopher Video »The Child«
content:
Hi,

I have been looking for the video »The Child« by Alex Gopher but I have found only a low-res-version here:

[http://ramhurl.real.com/smildemohurl.html?file=ra8/sputnik7/alexgopher\_t...](http://web.archive.org/web/20070809001508/http:/ramhurl.real.com/smildemohurl.html?file=ra8/sputnik7/alexgopher_thechild_320x180_ss300.rm "http://ramhurl.real.com/smildemohurl.html?file=ra8/sputnik7/alexgopher\_thechild\_320x180\_ss300.rm")

Does anybody know where to find a hi-res-version or where to buy the video (DVD)?

Thanks in advance!

Bye,

Oliver

 [‹ TrueType longevity?](http://web.archive.org/web/20070809001508/http:/typophile.com/node/18098 "Go to previous forum topic") [WGL ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070809001508/http:/typophile.com/node/18200 "Go to next forum topic")
author: olvradam

comments.content: I’ve somewhen found a 320px-version in a p2p-network, that’s the biggest one I have. Maybe I can upload it if you need it, when I’m back home again next week.

hi Oliver,  
try :  
 [http://youworkforthem.com/product.php?sku=M0040#details](http://web.archive.org/web/20070809001508/http:/youworkforthem.com/product.php?sku=M0040#details "http://youworkforthem.com/product.php?sku=M0040#details")

this DVD apparently contains the clip. It is out of stock at the moment, but youworkforthem may be able to help you. Try looking also under “H5” the name of the studio that made the clip. There may be something published in one of the “GASBOOK” series.

hope this helps,

pete

_I’ve somewhen found a 320px-version in a p2p-network, that’s the biggest one I have. Maybe I can upload it if you need it, when I’m back home again next week._

Yes, this would be cool :-) !

Oliver
